title: Exception: "An item with the same key has already been added" in stored proc validation
body:
Start with sample here: https://github.com/dotnet/EntityFramework.Docs/pull/3989

- Change code to use TPT stored proc mapping when using TPC model, for example by commenting out the case statements for TPT so that TPT falls through to use the TPC code.
- Change Program.cs to run `StoredProcedureMappingSample.Inset_Update_and_Delete_using_stored_procedures_with_TPT();`

```
>>>> Sample: Inset_Update_and_Delete_using_stored_procedures_with_TPT
```
